excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/3 Fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling, Marvel Cinematic Universe, Iron Man (Movies), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types Rating: Explicit Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings Relationships: Harry Potter/Tony Stark, James “Rhodey” Rhodes & Tony Stark, Hermione Granger & Harry Potter & Ron Weasley, Sirius Black & Harry Potter Characters: Harry Potter, Tony Stark, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Hermione Granger, Ron Weasley, Sirius Black, Steve Rogers, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton, Bruce Banner, James “Bucky” Barnes, Sam Wilson (Marvel), T'Challa (Marvel), Peter Parker, Luna Lovegood, Thor (Marvel), Loki (Marvel), Nick Fury, Kingsley Shacklebolt Additional Tags: Female Harry Potter, Alternate Universe - Soulmates, Soulmate-Identifying Marks, Romantic Soulmates, Platonic Soulmates, Unhealthy Coping Mechanisms, Not Captain America: Civil War (Movie) Compliant, Angst with a Happy Ending, Not Avengers: Endgame (Movie) Compliant Series: Part 2 of A red thread of lightning Summary:
there is a correlation (causation) between the times tony shattered and harrie died

blog.name: my-hogwarts-mystery
blog.title: My Hogwarts Mystery - Megan Fry
blog.description:
Hello everyone, and welcome to My Hogwarts Mystery. My name is Megan Fry and I'm a student at the Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, representing Ravenclaw (and not because blue and black looks great on me). Hopefully you'll all enjoy getting to see everything I get up at Hogwarts and maybe we'll get to meet each other along the way.

(Disclaimer: This Tumblr is not based on real life and none of the events that happened on here ever actually happened, except on the Harry Potter: Hogwarts Mystery App, but can be told in a different content for entertainment. This is mainly just for entertainment purposes and to not be taken too seriously.)

(Warning: Posts on here are likely to contain inappropriate language/phrases.)

summary: Wanna know something cool about my Head of House? Despite being a midget (No offence Professor), he is a really good dueler, and...
body:
Wanna know something cool about my Head of House? Despite being a midget (No offence Professor), he is a really good dueler, and he even let me practice some self defense using magic.

Although with Merula making everyone miserable, all I could think about is standing up to that bully, and eventually I faced her in a duel on school grounds and beat her. Yes, we did get in trouble, but let’s just say that Professor Snape really does have a favouritism thing because he’s Head of House for Slytherin. Especially for someone who’s grumpy all the time. But whatever. At least I didn’t get expelled.

blog.name: sillylangs
blog.title: languages are life
blog.description:
Velkommen!❀ 21 // Norwegian // Autistic // I study Mandarin, Ukrainian and Romanian, while dabbling in just about every other language there is. I am particularly interested in the Slavic languages ❀ I take requests for word lists in Norwegian!
❀

summary: Harry Potter Vocabulary in Romanian - Chapter 3
title: Harry Potter Vocabulary in Romanian - Chapter 3
body:
NOUNS

  • o pedeapsă [f] - a punishment
  • o gașcă [f] - a gang
  • o rază [f] - a ray, beam
  • o îndoială [f] - a doubt
  • o hârtie [f] - a paper
  • cerneală [f] - ink
  • o colivie [f] - a birdcage
  • o crăpătură [f] - a crack
  • o emisiune [f] - a show (on tv)
  • o furtună [f] - a storm
  • o barcă [f] - a boat
  • un leu [m] - a lion
  • un șoim [m] - an eagle
  • un bursuc [m] - a badger
  • un șarpe [m] - a snake
  • un perete [m] - a wall
  • un papagal [m] - a parrot
  • un dovleac [m] - a pumpkin
  • un lucru [n] - a thing
  • un miros [n] - a smell
  • un baston [n] - a stick
  • un plic [n] - an envelope
  • un timbru [n] - a stamp
  • un sigiliu [n] - a seal (on a letter)
  • un blazon [n] - a coat of arms
  • un semafor [n] - a traffic light
  • un tavan [n] - a ceiling
  • un zâmbet [n] - a smile
  • un dormitor [n] - a bedroom
  • un cearșaf [n] - a bedsheet
  • un colț [n] - a corner
  • un hotel [n] - a hotel

ADJECTIVES

  • caraghios - foolish
  • îngrozit - appalled
  • mulțumit - satisfied
  • umed - damp
  • pustiu - deserted
  • prăpădit - broken, wretched
  • limpede - clear, obvious
  • brusc - sudden
  • vechi - old
  • frig - cold
  • amabil - kind
  • dărăpănat - dilapidated
  • murdar - dirty
  • dolofan - pudgy

summary:
Penny: He's so sensitive!
MC: I know right!
Talbott: Please, stop that. I'll give you that dollar I found in your pocked.
Penny:...
body:
Penny: He’s so sensitive!

MC: I know right!

Talbott: Please, stop that. I’ll give you that dollar I found in your pocked.

Penny: oh, you can keep it.

blog.name: mallasia
blog.title: Mallasia's Thoughts
blog.description: Mallasia on AO3/Fanfiction - 21, too many fandoms, occassional writer, tea-drinker

body:
on days like this -

Tony x Harrie soulmate au

I’m super excited for this next piece I’m working on! I’ve always wanted to try writing a soulmate au because let’s be real here - I’m the greatest sucker for these! It was originally going to be a quick one shot but then it sort of grew out of my hands and now will be a three parter. The first part looks at the formative years (ie Hogwarts era). I’m hoping to pop it either tonight or tomorrow - but I think I’m happy with how the first section is turning out! So keep an eye out!

reblog.comment:
on days like this -

summary:
James S: It's Saturday!! Let's do something fun!!
Harry: It's 3am, go back to bed
James S: I can't, I'm too excited!!
Draco: Do...
body:
James S: It's Saturday!! Let's do something fun!!
Harry: It's 3am, go back to bed
James S: I can't, I'm too excited!!
Draco: Do the dishes, there's a huge pile of them on the sink
James: Okay!!!
Harry: You're evil
Draco: I prefer the word cunning

dialogue.label: James S:
dialogue.phrase: It's Saturday!! Let's do something fun!!

dialogue.phrase: Do the dishes, there's a huge pile of them on the sink

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, Louis Weasley, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, Louis Weasley, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!
trail.content:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

summary: Home | Alias Sorting | Plot & Setting | Face Claims Character Apps | Want Ads | Discord Chat | Advertising YHE is a six year old...
body:
Home | Alias Sorting | Plot & Setting | Face Claims
Character Apps | Want Ads | Discord Chat | Advertising

YHE is a six year old post potter canon site that is a combination of Rowling Canon and our own. It is a site created by fans and built upon by fans. We are set in 2029. Focused on the United Kingdom with locations all over England, Ireland, Scotland and soon Wales. Plots are character driven with monthly events that offer a way to meet new people with no effort. The more members we have the more locations we will add. We have no word count and a shipper app with relaxed activity rules. If you have an idea you have wanted to try in the HP world we are the place for you to do that.

Come and check us out!

blog.name: maybeshesnaped
blog.title: 𝑽𝒖𝒍𝒏𝒆𝒓𝒂 𝑺𝒂𝒏𝒆𝒏𝒕𝒖𝒓
blog.description:
| Snape is my son and Alan is my father |
sninsta: @thatbastardrickman

summary: Key moments when Severus Snape’s actions were misunderstood
title: Key moments when Severus Snape’s actions were misunderstood
body:
5.Practically every time Snape scolded Harry for venturing out of bounds

As we know now all too well, Harry was all that was left of Lily Potter, Snape’s first and only love. And Lily died so that Harry could live.

To make matters worse, Harry looked and acted just like James Potter – the one who tormented Snape for no good reason, the one who stole Lily’s heart and the one who failed to protect her from Voldemort.

Seeing his spitting image ‘strutting’ around Hogwarts and answering back with that same smart mouth must have been nothing short of infuriating. And yet… No matter how much it tore him apart, Harry was a living reminder of Lily Potter. After all, Harry had ‘her eyes’.

Understanding Snape’s perpetual bind helps us to appreciate his fortitude and courage through many a thankless task. His was a tragic tale of misunderstanding and the truth might have easily died with him. However, Snape’s legacy lived on in Harry’s son, Albus.

-Pottermore
